The Parka for Extreme Weather: Light, strong and windproof shell with PFC-free impregnation
Packable | Hooded | Pockets: Hood is adjustable and fits over helmet
Parka can be packed into its hood
Spacious top-loaded pockets with concealed zippers
Large inside storage pockets in mesh
Drawcord adjustments at the waist and lower hem

Specifications.Insulation:
G-Loft Supreme: 100% Polyester
Filling weight: 120 g/m2
Specifications.Pockets:
[exterior] 2 zippered chest pockets, Spacious top-loading pockets with concealed zippers
[interior] 1 large storage mesh pocket
Specifications.Recommended Use: Harsh Winter Weather, Mountaineering, Alpinism, Winter Outdoor Activities, Snowy Commutes to the Office
